title: Simon Lumsden
text: Simon Lumsden is Associate Professor of <a href="philosophy">philosophy</a> at <a href="University%20of%20New%20South%20Wales">University of New South Wales</a>. He is known for his research on <a href="subjectivism">subjectivism</a>, <a href="German%20idealism">German idealism</a> and <a href="poststructuralism">poststructuralism</a>.
